Last chance to get full grant savings!
Special community pricing expires July 31. Act now so you don’t miss out!
Take advantage of group pricing and special grant offer!
The overwhelming support and enthusiasm for Solarize Andover has made the program an unqualified success, so Astrum Solar is continuing to honor the group pricing through July 31. In addition, Astrum Solar will be making customers whole on the state rebate.* Move quickly to get your contract signed. Thanks to the hard work of local volunteers, Solarize Andover reached Tier 5 pricing, the lowest available! This means that, in addition to state and local incentives, everyone who signs up is able to take advantage of the lowest pricing possible through the program. Now is the best time to go solar.
Don’t miss the deadline! Contact your solar consultant today to discuss your system and how you can go solar and start producing your own electricity for less than what you are currently paying your utility company.
Contact your Solar Consultant today! <http://go.astrumsolar.com/solarizeandover>
Questions?
Contact your solar coach, Anil Navkal, at solarizeandover@gmail.com <mailto:solarizeandover@gmail.com> or 978-475-0001.
Group Pricing Deadline: July 31
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call us: 800-903-6130
You’re receiving this email because you’ve requested info about Solarize Andover.
* Astrum Solar will continue to honor the group pricing through July 31, 2014 and will pay the difference between the former state rebate (40 cents per watt up to a maximum of $2,000) and the revised state rebate effective July 1, 2014 (25 cents per watt up to a maximum of $1,250) to eligible homeowners with a site quality of 80% or more.
You must be a Andover, MA resident to participate in this program.
